name: Don't look at the keyboard
description:
Do you want to be a quick keyboard master? You're in the right place, then. all you have to do is download this fun game and make keyboard anteremans.

All you have to do is try to press the hollow keys without looking at your own keyboard. Buddha will speed you up a lot. :D

-----

Features List

  • Q Keyboard
  • Splash Screen v1.0
  • Custom Title Bar v1.0

Coming Soon Features List

  • F Keyboard
  • Keyboard Skins
  • Music's
  • Language System
  • Settings
  • Resolution
  • Discord RPC
